plays.text: Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Hooking Marty Murray
Penalty to John LeClair 2 minutes for Interference Josef Melichar
Penalty to Josef Melichar 2 minutes for Interference Donald Brashear
Goal scored by John LeClair assisted by Kim Johnsson and Mark Recchi
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for Interference Paul Ranheim
Penalty to Paul Ranheim 2 minutes for Roughing Darius Kasparaitis
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for Crosschecking Michal Rozsival
Penalty to Michal Rozsival 2 minutes for Roughing Keith Primeau
Goal scored by Toby Petersen assisted by SHANE ENDICOTT
Penalty to Billy Tibbetts 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jan Hrdina 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Marty Murray
Goal scored by Alexei Kovalev assisted by Jan Hrdina and Milan Kraft
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for Diving Keith Primeau
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for Hooking Darius Kasparaitis
Goal scored by Keith Primeau assisted by John LeClair and Mark Recchi
Goal scored by Marty Murray unassisted
